original: ldog pa log pa las gzhan yin pa'i phyir ni ba lang ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa las log pa /
analyzed: ldog pa log pa las gzhan yin pa'i phyir ni ba lang ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa las log pa /
translated: Because the opposite of the opposite is different from it, the opposite of the non-cow is different from the cow.

original: ba lang ma yin pa las log pa yang ba lang las log pa'i phyir ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba lang ma yin pa las log pa yang ba lang las log pa'i phyir ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: And because the opposite of the non-cow is the opposite of the cow, the cow would not be the opposite of the non-cow.

original: ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa yod do zhes brjod pas ni ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa med pa yin na //
analyzed: ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa yod do zhes brjod pas ni ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa med pa yin na //
translated: When it is said that the cow is the opposite of the non-cow, the cow is not the non-cow.

original: gal te 'di la de med na ni ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa yod do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di la de med na ni ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa yod do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the cow were not the non-cow, it would be said that the cow is the non-cow.

original: tha dad pa ni 'ga' yang 'ga' la yod pa ma yin pas ni ba lang ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa ni 'ga' yang 'ga' la yod pa ma yin pas ni ba lang ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since nothing is different from anything, it follows that the cow is not the non-cow.

original: de lta na ni 'ga' yang gang las kyang mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'ga' yang gang las kyang mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: If it were so, then nothing would be the opposite of anything.

original: de lta na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is being said:üîΩIf it were so, then nothing would be the opposite of anything.

original: des na gang dag chos tha dad pa nyid kyis dngos po med @193b pa dngos po nyid du 'dod pa de dag bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: des na gang dag chos tha dad pa nyid kyis dngos po med @193b pa dngos po nyid du 'dod pa de dag bsal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, those who maintain that a non-entity is an entity because of the difference of the entity are refuted.

original: gzhan la gzhan med pa'i med par ni de las tha dad do zhes 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la gzhan med pa'i med par ni de las tha dad do zhes 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not tenable to say that the difference of that is the non-existence of one in the other.

original: de la gzhan med pa med na ni gsal bar gzhan nyid do //
analyzed: de la gzhan med pa med na ni gsal bar gzhan nyid do //
translated: If the non-existence of one in the other does not exist, then the difference of the manifestation is just the other.

original: gal te gzhan ma yin na ni mi gzhan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gzhan ma yin na ni mi gzhan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not the other, then it would be called ‚Äúnon-other.‚Äù

original: phyi 'di'i yang rnam par phye nas lung bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: phyi 'di'i yang rnam par phye nas lung bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: The other should be analyzed and explained in the same way as this external one.

original: dngos po'i gnas thabs la ltos nas ni gzhan yang ma yin la /
analyzed: dngos po'i gnas thabs la ltos nas ni gzhan yang ma yin la /
translated: In relation to the mode of being of an entity, it is not the other,

original: gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin no //
translated: and it is not the non-other.

original: gal te de de lta na ldog pa ldog pa med do zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de de lta na ldog pa ldog pa med do zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is like that, then the negation of the negation does not exist.

original: ldog pa zhes bya ba yod do zhes sus smras /üîΩdngos po la dngos po gzhan med do zhes bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ldog pa zhes bya ba yod do zhes sus smras / dngos po la dngos po gzhan med do zhes bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Who says that the negation called ‚Äúexists‚Äù?üîΩIt is that an entity does not have another entity,

original: dngos po la dngos po gzhan med pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la dngos po gzhan med pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not that the existence of the non-existence of another entity in an entity exists.

original: de lta na yang dngos po gzhan med pa med do zhes bya ba 'di nyid brjod pa yin pa'i phyir 'thad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang dngos po gzhan med pa med do zhes bya ba 'di nyid brjod pa yin pa'i phyir 'thad pa kho na'o //
translated: Still, it is quite reasonable to say that the absence of another entity is not absent, because this is what is being said.

original: ji ltar phyogs la bum pa med pa zhes bstan pa de la ltos nas ni ldog pa gzhan ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ji ltar phyogs la bum pa med pa zhes bstan pa de la ltos nas ni ldog pa gzhan ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: Just as it is taught that a pot does not exist in a direction, in dependence on that, it is not at all another exclusion.

original: da ni brda'i rjes su byed pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni brda'i rjes su byed pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the mere conformity with convention,

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos po tha mi dad par bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos po tha mi dad par bshad do //
translated: he explains that there is no difference in entity with ‚ÄúTherefore‚Ä¶‚Äù and so on.

original: brda'i rjes su byed pa nyid la ni /
analyzed: brda'i rjes su byed pa nyid la ni /
translated: In mere conformity with convention,

original: sgra dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: there is ‚Äúsound‚Äù and so on.

original: brjod par bya ba la ni tha dad pa med do zhes bya bas brda'i bye brag la brten pa'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba la ni tha dad pa med do zhes bya bas brda'i bye brag la brten pa'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: There is no difference in the object of expression, as the reason is based on the difference in convention.

original: 'dir yang ldog pa ni gzhan zlog par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: 'dir yang ldog pa ni gzhan zlog par byed pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
translated: Here, the exclusion is the nature of the negation of another.

original: des ldog pa ldog pa ni byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: des ldog pa ldog pa ni byed pa po yin no //
translated: By that, the exclusion is the agent of the exclusion.

original: 'di'i ldog pa zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa nges pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i ldog pa zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa nges pa yin no //
translated: Here, the exclusion is the ascertainment of the relation.

original: des na 'di tsam gyis ni 'dir mi bden pa nyid sgro btags nas rang gi ngo bo la gnas pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kho na rtogs so zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di tsam gyis ni 'dir mi bden pa nyid sgro btags nas rang gi ngo bo la gnas pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kho na rtogs so zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that by this much, one superimposes unreality and realizes only the nature of things that abide in their own entity.

original: gzhan dag de mi bzod pas brjod par bya ba la tha dad pa med pa'i zhes smra'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag de mi bzod pas brjod par bya ba la tha dad pa med pa'i zhes smra'o //
translated: Others, not accepting this, say that there is no difference in the object of expression.

original: log pa dang ldog pa'i tshig gnyis kyis brjod par bya ba gang yin pa de la khyad par med pa'i phyir brda'i bye brag kyang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: log pa dang ldog pa'i tshig gnyis kyis brjod par bya ba gang yin pa de la khyad par med pa'i phyir brda'i bye brag kyang mi rung ngo //
translated: Because there is no difference in the object of expression by the two words, incorrect and correct, the difference in conventional symbols is also not tenable.

original: brjod par bya ba tha dad pa med pa'i gtan tshigs smras pa ni gnyi gas gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba tha dad pa med pa'i gtan tshigs smras pa ni gnyi gas gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The reason that there is no difference in the object of expression is stated as ‚Äúbecause both express one thing.‚Äù

original: tshig gnyis kyis gcig kho na brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig gnyis kyis gcig kho na brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the two words express only one thing.

original: brda ni brjod par bya ba rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //üîΩgal te khyad par med na de ltar rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can gyi brdas @194a * //
analyzed: brda ni brjod par bya ba rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can yin no // gal te khyad par med na de ltar rtogs pa'i 'bras bu can gyi brdas @194a * //
translated: A conventional symbol has the effect of understanding the object of expression.

original: ci zhig bya /
analyzed: ci zhig bya /
translated: If there is no difference, what is the use of a conventional symbol that has the effect of such understanding?

original: der 'brel pa sgo btags pa la dgos pa ji srid cig srid pa bstan pa'i phyir de nyid du rtsod pa mthar thug par ston pa ni de ltar na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: der 'brel pa sgo btags pa la dgos pa ji srid cig srid pa bstan pa'i phyir de nyid du rtsod pa mthar thug par ston pa ni de ltar na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In order to show the purpose of the connection of the door of expression, the ultimate dispute is shown in that very place, saying ‚Äúthus.‚Äù

original: de bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ni /
translated: In order to refute that, it is explained:

original: gnyi gas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnyi gas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBoth‚Äù

original: gzhan las ldog pa dang gzhan las log pa'i sgra gnyi gas gcig brjod pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa dang gzhan las log pa'i sgra gnyi gas gcig brjod pa yin mod kyi /
translated: Although both the expression of the opposite of other and the expression of the opposite of the opposite of other express one thing,

original: de dag gis brjod par bya ba la gnas pa'i shan khyad par dang ldan pas na de dag las gcig la gnas pa'i tha dad pa'i dbye ba gang la yod pa brjod par bya ba tha dad pa de dang ldan pas de tha dad pa'i don bzhin du
analyzed: de dag gis brjod par bya ba la gnas pa'i shan khyad par dang ldan pas na de dag las gcig la gnas pa'i tha dad pa'i dbye ba gang la yod pa brjod par bya ba tha dad pa de dang ldan pas de tha dad pa'i don bzhin du
translated: since the object of expression is qualified by the property of abiding in those, that which has the division of difference abiding in those is said to have the difference of the object of expression.

original: rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: rtogs par byed do //
translated: Thus, it is understood as having a different meaning.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pa tsam gyi rang bzhin gyi don gcig kho nas gnyi gas pa rjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la rnam par gnas pa tsam gyi rang bzhin gyi don gcig kho nas gnyi gas pa rjod pa yin no //
translated: By the mere nature of abiding in its own nature, both express the same meaning.

original: de ldog pa'i sgras ni 'di'i ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa zhes drug pas brjod pa'i tha dad pa bsgrubs pas don de rjod par byed do //
analyzed: de ldog pa'i sgras ni 'di'i ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa zhes drug pas brjod pa'i tha dad pa bsgrubs pas don de rjod par byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúnegation‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúnegation of that‚Äù expresses the difference that is expressed by the sixth case, ‚Äúgenitive,‚Äù and thus expresses that meaning.

original: de yang log pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba'i don ston pa na don tha dad pa la brten par snang bas na rang bzhin gyi sgras byas so //
analyzed: de yang log pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba'i don ston pa na don tha dad pa la brten par snang bas na rang bzhin gyi sgras byas so //
translated: Moreover, when the word ‚Äúnegation‚Äù is used to indicate the meaning that is to be expressed, it appears to be based on a different meaning, and thus it is a natural expression.

original: 'di don tha dad pa'i mthar thug pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di don tha dad pa'i mthar thug pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: However, it is not the case that it is ultimately based on a different meaning.

original: 'on kyang bstan pa na don tha dad pa la brten pa lta bur mngon pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bstan pa na don tha dad pa la brten pa lta bur mngon pa yin no //
translated: Nevertheless, when it is taught, it appears to be based on a different meaning.

original: des na ldog pa dang de'i 'brel pa sgro btags nas log pa'i dngos po nyid kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: des na ldog pa dang de'i 'brel pa sgro btags nas log pa'i dngos po nyid kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Thus, having superimposed negation and its relation, it is ultimately based on the mere negation of an entity.

original: de'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the meaning of that.

original: brda tha dad pa zhes bya ba gal te sgra tha dad pa tsam las brjod na de ni brjod par bya ba la gnas pa'i khyad par med kyang shing dang rkang 'thung la sogs pa'i tshig dag la de lta bu'i khyad par yod par mthong ba kho na'o
analyzed: brda tha dad pa zhes bya ba gal te sgra tha dad pa tsam las brjod na de ni brjod par bya ba la gnas pa'i khyad par med kyang shing dang rkang 'thung la sogs pa'i tshig dag la de lta bu'i khyad par yod par mthong ba kho na'o
translated: If you say that the difference in words is due to a difference in sounds, then even though there is no difference in the object that is expressed, you see that there is such a difference in words like tree and trunk.

original: // 'on te don tha dad pa nyid yin na de ni ma grub ste /
analyzed: // 'on te don tha dad pa nyid yin na de ni ma grub ste /
translated: But if you say that the difference in words is due to a difference in objects, that is not established.

original: gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the one is expressed.

original: gcig brjod pa nyid ni ldog pa dang ldog pa'i sgra dag tha dad pa dmigs pa med kyang 'gyur ba yin te /üîΩ'di ni ba lang ma yin pa las log pa'o //
analyzed: gcig brjod pa nyid ni ldog pa dang ldog pa'i sgra dag tha dad pa dmigs pa med kyang 'gyur ba yin te / 'di ni ba lang ma yin pa las log pa'o //
translated: The one is expressed even though the words that exclude and do not exclude are not observed to be different.üîΩThis is because the words are used without contradiction:üîΩThis is not a non-cow.

original: 'di'i ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa zhes 'jug pa gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdon gzhan dang ldan pa gzhan la 'jug na ni gnod pa'am /
analyzed: 'di'i ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa zhes 'jug pa gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro // don gzhan dang ldan pa gzhan la 'jug na ni gnod pa'am /
translated: This is excluded from a non-cow.

original: btags par 'gyur na 'dir ni don tha dad pa mi dmigs kyang de ltar srid pa ma yin pas ji ltar don gcig pa nyid ma yin /
analyzed: btags par 'gyur na 'dir ni don tha dad pa mi dmigs kyang de ltar srid pa ma yin pas ji ltar don gcig pa nyid ma yin /
translated: If the words were used to refer to something else that has a different object, there would be a contradiction or a designation. But in this case, even though a different object is not observed, it is not possible for that to be so. Therefore, how can the words not refer to the same object?

original: 'on te 'dir ni 'di'i ldog pa zhes @194b de las bkol ba tha dad pa'i rten du snang ba gzhan du ni de nyid do zhes na de ni ma rung ste /
analyzed: 'on te 'dir ni 'di'i ldog pa zhes @194b de las bkol ba tha dad pa'i rten du snang ba gzhan du ni de nyid do zhes na de ni ma rung ste /
translated: But if you say that here it is the appearance of a different basis, which is the opposite of that, and elsewhere it is that itself, that is not correct.

original: de'i mthar thug pa nyid na de tha dad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir dang / gnod pa nyid du thal par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i mthar thug pa nyid na de tha dad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir dang / gnod pa nyid du thal par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because at the end of that, its difference is not observed, and because it would absurdly follow that it is contradictory.

original: bum pa ma yin pa las bum pa'i sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: bum pa ma yin pa las bum pa'i sgra bzhin no //
translated: It is like the word pot in relation to non-pot.

original: de gnod pa med pa'i phyir yul gcig po nyid yin yang rtogs pa tha dad pa'i phyir don tha dad pa lta bur mngon pa yin no zhes bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de gnod pa med pa'i phyir yul gcig po nyid yin yang rtogs pa tha dad pa'i phyir don tha dad pa lta bur mngon pa yin no zhes bya ba bstan to //
translated: Because it is non-contradictory, even though it is a single object, it is as if it has a different meaning because of the different realizations.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan yang brjod par bya ba la brten pa'i shan gyi khyad par yin no //üîΩ'di de dang don gcig nyid yin yang 'di'i ldog pa zhes don de nyid de ltar byas nas rtogs par byed do//
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan yang brjod par bya ba la brten pa'i shan gyi khyad par yin no // 'di de dang don gcig nyid yin yang 'di'i ldog pa zhes don de nyid de ltar byas nas rtogs par byed do//
translated: The reason for that is the difference in the basis of expression.üîΩEven though it is the same meaning as that, it is understood in that way by making the meaning of that into the opposite of that.

original: ji ltar de'i mthar thug pa yin yang don lta bur snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar de'i mthar thug pa yin yang don lta bur snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Even though it is at the end of that, it appears as if it were a different meaning.

original: 'grel pa ni sgra rnams kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni sgra rnams kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary is ‚Äúof the words.‚Äù

original: gal te 'di dag yul gyi rang gi ngo bo la rag las nas 'jug pa yin na tha dad pa med pa la tha dad pa med pa kho nar go bar byed par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'di dag yul gyi rang gi ngo bo la rag las nas 'jug pa yin na tha dad pa med pa la tha dad pa med pa kho nar go bar byed par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If these were to operate in dependence on the intrinsic reality of the object, then they would make known only what is undifferentiated.üîΩBut even though they make that known, they do not become differentiated like the object.

original: de rtogs par byed kyang don tha dad pa bzhin du mi 'gyur ba zhig na de ltar yang ma yin te 'dod pas kyang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rtogs par byed kyang don tha dad pa bzhin du mi 'gyur ba zhig na de ltar yang ma yin te 'dod pas kyang 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not so, because they also operate by desire.

original: de lta na yang rtogs pa tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis brda'i bye brag 'di ga las she na de dag ces smos so //
analyzed: de lta na yang rtogs pa tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis brda'i bye brag 'di ga las she na de dag ces smos so //
translated: Even so, how is this difference in conventional symbols due to the difference in the cognition?üîΩHe says, ‚Äúbecause of that,‚Äù because they are not based on things.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po la brten pa ma yin pa de'i phyir na gal te don tha dad pa 'am tha dad pa ma yin pa la sbyor yang rung ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po la brten pa ma yin pa de'i phyir na gal te don tha dad pa 'am tha dad pa ma yin pa la sbyor yang rung ste /
translated: Therefore, whether they are applied to a different or non-different object,

original: de lta na yang de nyid rtogs par byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang de nyid rtogs par byed pa kho na'o //
translated: they still make that known.

original: gal te don tha dad pa la sbyar na de nyid rtogs par byed la /
analyzed: gal te don tha dad pa la sbyar na de nyid rtogs par byed la /
translated: If they are applied to a different object, they make that known.

original: gal te tha dad pa med pa la sbyar na ni de nyid rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa med pa la sbyar na ni de nyid rtogs par byed do //
translated: If it is applied to that which is not different, it is understood in that way.

original: dper na aaksh'i sgra ba ru ra dang cho lo la 'jug pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na aaksh'i sgra ba ru ra dang cho lo la 'jug pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the word ak·π£a is used for the fruit of the jujube tree and for the dice.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir ba lang dang ba lang nyid ces bya bas dngos po gcig brjod mod kyi tha dad pa'i don can gyi rnam par dbye bas don tha dad pa lta bur ston par snang ste de ltar sbyor ba mthong ba
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa'i rgyu de'i phyir ba lang dang ba lang nyid ces bya bas dngos po gcig brjod mod kyi tha dad pa'i don can gyi rnam par dbye bas don tha dad pa lta bur ston par snang ste de ltar sbyor ba mthong ba
translated: Since that is so, the reason is that although the statement ‚Äúcow and cowness‚Äù expresses a single entity, it appears to indicate a difference in meaning because of the difference in the meaning of the distinction.

original: goms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: goms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the application is seen in that way.

original: 'di'i pa lang nyid ces bya ba tha dad pa'i don can gyi rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa sgra 'di ni ba lang la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i pa lang nyid ces bya ba tha dad pa'i don can gyi rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa sgra 'di ni ba lang la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: This word ‚Äúcowness‚Äù that has the distinction of a different meaning is applied to the cow.

original: rnam par dbye ba de yang gnyi gar yang brdar byas pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba de yang gnyi gar yang brdar byas pa yin te /
translated: And that distinction is made by convention in both cases.

original: 'di'i ba lang nyid ces bya ba ni tha mi dad pa la yin la /
analyzed: 'di'i ba lang nyid ces bya ba ni tha mi dad pa la yin la /
translated: This ‚Äúcowness‚Äù is in that which is not different.

original: bram ze'i ril ba spyi blugs zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa la'o //
analyzed: bram ze'i ril ba spyi blugs zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa la'o //
translated: The ‚ÄúBrahmin‚Äôs water pot‚Äù is in that which is different.

original: @195a * // des na tha dad pa la sbyor ba mthong ba goms pas na 'dir don bzhin du ston par byed par snang ngo //
analyzed: @195a * // des na tha dad pa la sbyor ba mthong ba goms pas na 'dir don bzhin du ston par byed par snang ngo //
translated: Therefore, when one sees the application of different words, one becomes accustomed to the fact that they appear to indicate their referents in accordance with their meaning.

original: des khyad par 'ga' zhig shes par bya ba'i phyir tha dad pa'i don can bzhin du sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des khyad par 'ga' zhig shes par bya ba'i phyir tha dad pa'i don can bzhin du sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one applies different words in order to understand some difference.

original: des na de ltar don gcig kyang brda tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar don gcig kyang brda tha dad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, even though they have the same meaning, the words are different.

original: de srid tsam gyi rtogs pa mi 'dra ba dang ldan pas ni thams cad la tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de srid tsam gyi rtogs pa mi 'dra ba dang ldan pas ni thams cad la tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: But when one has the understanding that they are merely that, one does not consider them to be different.

original: tha dad pa med pa la yang skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa gegs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa la yang skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa gegs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no obstruction to their application by the power of the speaker‚Äôs desire, even though there is no difference.

original: de bshad pa ni gzhan la yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni gzhan la yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of that is ‚Äúin other cases as well.‚Äù

original: sgra rnams kyi skyes bu 'dod pa la gegs byed pa med pa de nyid du ston pa ni /
analyzed: sgra rnams kyi skyes bu 'dod pa la gegs byed pa med pa de nyid du ston pa ni /
translated: The words are not obstructed by the speaker‚Äôs desire. This is demonstrated by the example.

original: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFor example‚Äù

original: dngos po gcig gcig sgra thams cad kyis gcig gi tshig gi mtha' can gyis ston to //
analyzed: dngos po gcig gcig sgra thams cad kyis gcig gi tshig gi mtha' can gyis ston to //
translated: All words that have the suffix ‚Äúone‚Äù indicate one thing.

original: lhas byin dkar sham mo //
analyzed: lhas byin dkar sham mo //
translated: ‚ÄúDevadatta is fair.‚Äù

original: spom mo zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: spom mo zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: like the word ‚Äúpomo.‚Äù

original: de nyid dkar sham la sogs pa brjod par bya ba ma byas par gus pa'i sgras brjod pa na mang po'i tshig gi mtha' can gyis ston te /
analyzed: de nyid dkar sham la sogs pa brjod par bya ba ma byas par gus pa'i sgras brjod pa na mang po'i tshig gi mtha' can gyis ston te /
translated: When one says the respectful word ‚Äúthose‚Äù without having made the statement ‚Äúwhite, etc.,‚Äù one indicates it with the plural ending.

original: de kho na la dmigs nas bla ma 'di dag ces bya ba lta bur ro //
analyzed: de kho na la dmigs nas bla ma 'di dag ces bya ba lta bur ro //
translated: Observing just that, one says, ‚ÄúThese gurus.‚Äù

original: des na de la mang po nyid med kyang ston par byed pa de ni gegs med do //üîΩ'on te 'dri mang po nyid brjod kyang mang po'i tshig mtha' can brjod pa ni legs pa tsam gyis yin no //
analyzed: des na de la mang po nyid med kyang ston par byed pa de ni gegs med do // 'on te 'dri mang po nyid brjod kyang mang po'i tshig mtha' can brjod pa ni legs pa tsam gyis yin no //
translated: Thus, although there is no plurality in that, there is no impediment to its being indicated.üîΩBut even if one were to say ‚Äúthose many,‚Äù the use of the plural ending is merely a matter of good form.

original: gcig po de la ni mang po'i tshig bstan pa nyid legs par brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: gcig po de la ni mang po'i tshig bstan pa nyid legs par brjod do zhe na /
translated: It is good form to indicate the plural by the plural word even in the case of one.

original: de bzhin du tha mi dad pa la tha dad par brjod pa'i drug pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du tha mi dad pa la tha dad par brjod pa'i drug pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the sixth case, which expresses difference in the undifferentiated, would be the same.

original: da ni brjod bya'i shan gyi khyad par gyis zhes tshig le'ur byas par brjod pa dang 'grel pa yang khyad par 'ga' zhig shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes gang brjod pa der ni khyad par dang bcas te ma bstan pas na /
analyzed: da ni brjod bya'i shan gyi khyad par gyis zhes tshig le'ur byas par brjod pa dang 'grel pa yang khyad par 'ga' zhig shes par bya ba'i phyir zhes gang brjod pa der ni khyad par dang bcas te ma bstan pas na /
translated: Now, in the verse it was said, ‚Äúbecause of the difference in the subject matter,‚Äù and in the commentary it was said, ‚Äúin order to make known some of the differences between the statements and the commentary.‚Äù But since that was not explained,

original: de bstan pa'i phyir dgos pa med pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir dgos pa med pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
translated: in order to explain it, the verse says, ‚Äúbecause there is no purpose.‚Äù

original: brjod par bya ba khyad par med kyang dgos pa'i khyad par gyis /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba khyad par med kyang dgos pa'i khyad par gyis /
translated: Even though the subject matter is not different, because of the difference in purpose,

original: bla ma dag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra de bzhin du /
analyzed: bla ma dag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra de bzhin du /
translated: the words ‚Äúteacher‚Äù and so on are used.

original: 'dir gal te dgos pa'i khyad par med na ni brda'i bye brag med par 'gyur ba zhig na dgos pa de ni yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gal te dgos pa'i khyad par med na ni brda'i bye brag med par 'gyur ba zhig na dgos pa de ni yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: If there were no difference in purpose, there would be no difference in the conventional expressions, but that purpose does exist.

original: gal te brjod bya'i cha'i khyad par sngar bshad zin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te brjod bya'i cha'i khyad par sngar bshad zin pa ma yin nam /
translated: But wasn‚Äôt the difference in the subject matter explained earlier?

original: ji ltar de nyid da ltar dgos pa'i khyad par du brjod ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar de nyid da ltar dgos pa'i khyad par du brjod ce na /
translated: How can that be called a difference in purpose now?

original: brjod par @195b bya ba la brten pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par de nyid brjod pa'i shan gyi khyad par du brjod pa de nyid 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston par byed do //
analyzed: brjod par @195b bya ba la brten pa'i dgos pa'i khyad par de nyid brjod pa'i shan gyi khyad par du brjod pa de nyid 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston par byed do //
translated: The difference in the purpose based on the object of expression is expressed as the difference in the expression of the object of expression. That very thing is shown by ‚Äúthus‚Äù and so forth.

original: khyad par gzhan zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par gzhan zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚Äú Another difference‚Äù means

original: khyad par gzhan dag go //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan dag go //
translated: another difference.

original: log pa zhes bya ba ni ma log pa las tha dad pa la ltos nas don la sgra 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: log pa zhes bya ba ni ma log pa las tha dad pa la ltos nas don la sgra 'jug pa yin te /
translated: ‚Äú Opposite‚Äù means that the word engages the object in dependence on the opposite of the non-opposite,

original: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: as previously explained.

original: don de nyid ni ldog pa'i tshig gis kyang rjod par byed do //
analyzed: don de nyid ni ldog pa'i tshig gis kyang rjod par byed do //
translated: That very meaning is also expressed by the word ‚Äúopposite.‚Äù

original: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
analyzed: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
translated: There is this difference:

original: 'di'i ldog pa zhes bya ba'i sgra gang yin pa 'di ni dngos po de'i dkar po ma yin pa la sogs pa dag las tha dad pa gan gyi pa de dag spang pas 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i ldog pa zhes bya ba'i sgra gang yin pa 'di ni dngos po de'i dkar po ma yin pa la sogs pa dag las tha dad pa gan gyi pa de dag spang pas 'jug pa yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúopposite‚Äù engages by excluding those that are not that thing, such as non-white, and so on.

original: 'di'i ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa zhes rtogs pa'i don la yod pa'i dkar po ma yin pa la sogs pa las tha dad pa gang yin pa de dag de ltar spang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i ba lang ma yin pa las ldog pa zhes rtogs pa'i don la yod pa'i dkar po ma yin pa la sogs pa las tha dad pa gang yin pa de dag de ltar spang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: In this case, the meaning of the cognition ‚Äúthe opposite of non-cow‚Äù is the exclusion of whatever is different from non-white, etc.

original: de la rgyal kyis phyogs pa ji ltar rtogs pa tsam gyis rtogs pa don du gnyer ba ni de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rgyal kyis phyogs pa ji ltar rtogs pa tsam gyis rtogs pa don du gnyer ba ni de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In this case, the one who seeks to know the meaning of the cognition ‚Äúthe opposite of non-cow‚Äù knows it in that way.

original: 'di la ba lang ma yin pa las log pa zhes bya bas ni de la brten pa'i tha dad pa gzhan spong ba ma yin no //üîΩde bzhin du 'di ni ba lang ngo //
analyzed: 'di la ba lang ma yin pa las log pa zhes bya bas ni de la brten pa'i tha dad pa gzhan spong ba ma yin no // de bzhin du 'di ni ba lang ngo //
translated: In this case, the expression ‚Äúthe opposite of non-cow‚Äù does not exclude other differences based on it.

original: 'di'i ba lang nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i ba lang nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, ‚Äúthis is a cow,‚Äù ‚Äúthis is cowness,‚Äù etc. should be understood.

original: 'di dag nyid ldog pa'i dang log pa'i sgra de gnyis kyis ji skad brjod pa'i sgra bye brag gi gzhi zhes bya ba rten yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag nyid ldog pa'i dang log pa'i sgra de gnyis kyis ji skad brjod pa'i sgra bye brag gi gzhi zhes bya ba rten yin te /
translated: These very [expressions] are the basis of the distinction of the two terms ‚Äúthe opposite‚Äù and ‚Äúthe opposite of,‚Äù which are the support.

original: dgos pa de la brten pa nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgos pa de la brten pa nyid kyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they function by being based on that purpose.

original: de ltar rtogs pas dgos pa ci zhig 'grub ce na /
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pas dgos pa ci zhig 'grub ce na /
translated: What is the purpose of understanding it in this way?

original: rtogs pa po'i 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i zhes smos so //
analyzed: rtogs pa po'i 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa'i zhes smos so //
translated: It is said: ‚ÄúThis is a convention that follows the desire of the one who understands it.‚Äù

original: brda'i bye brag 'di ni rtogs pa po'i 'dod pa tsam gyi rjes su byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: brda'i bye brag 'di ni rtogs pa po'i 'dod pa tsam gyi rjes su byed pa yin gyi /
translated: This particular convention follows only the desire of the one who understands it.

original: dngos po la ni ltos pa ci yang med do //
analyzed: dngos po la ni ltos pa ci yang med do //
translated: It does not depend on anything at all in reality.

original: ji ltar mang po'i tshig gis dkar sham la sogs pa'i dngos po la yod pa nyid rjod par byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar mang po'i tshig gis dkar sham la sogs pa'i dngos po la yod pa nyid rjod par byed pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as many words express the existence of things such as whiteness,

original: brda'i bye brag 'di ni dngos po gdangs pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i don ma yin no //
analyzed: brda'i bye brag 'di ni dngos po gdangs pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i don ma yin no //
translated: this particular convention does not have the purpose of teaching the particular manifestation of a thing.

original: 'on kyang rtogs pa po 'ga' zhig ci zhig ltar rtogs par 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rtogs pa po 'ga' zhig ci zhig ltar rtogs par 'dod pa yin te /
translated: However, the one who understands it desires to understand it in some way.

original: des na 'di de ltar rtogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di de ltar rtogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it causes one to understand it in that way.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di rtogs pa mi 'dra ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di rtogs pa mi 'dra ba yin gyi /
translated: For that very reason, it is a different understanding.

original: 'di la dngos po'i don khyad par ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la dngos po'i don khyad par ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no particular object in reality.

original: 'grel pa ni gang ge tshe zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'grel pa ni gang ge tshe zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The commentary is ‚ÄúWhen . . .‚Äù
This

original: ni khyad par gzhan spong ba rnam par 'grel to //
analyzed: ni khyad par gzhan spong ba rnam par 'grel to //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù excludes other distinctions.

original: gang gi tshe zhes bya bas ni mi spong ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhes bya bas ni mi spong ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúwhen‚Äù excludes the absence of distinction.

original: yang ji ltar 'dir ni khyad par spong pa der ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar 'dir ni khyad par spong pa der ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: How is it that here there is the exclusion of distinction, but not there?

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, he says,

original: gang du khyad par gzhan dang 'brel par 'gal ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa der ni /
analyzed: gang du khyad par gzhan dang 'brel par 'gal ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa der ni /
translated: where there is the recognition of an incompatible nature in connection with another distinction,

original: khyad par gzhan spangs pa kho na yin la gang du 'gal ba med pa der ni ma spangs pa yin no //üîΩ'gal ba'i phyir ni chos gzhan dang rang bzhin gcig par ma rtogs pas ni gzhi mthun pa nyid dam /
analyzed: khyad par gzhan spangs pa kho na yin la gang du 'gal ba med pa der ni ma spangs pa yin no // 'gal ba'i phyir ni chos gzhan dang rang bzhin gcig par ma rtogs pas ni gzhi mthun pa nyid dam /
translated: there is the exclusion of another distinction, but where there is no incompatibility, there is no exclusion.

original: khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po ma yin no //
translated: Because of incompatibility, there is no common locus or the nature of distinction and distinguished when there is no recognition of the same nature as another property.

original: chos gzhan dang gcig pa nyid ni chos gnyis kyi gzhi mthun pa yin te dper na autpala nyid sngon po'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir autpala dang sngon po gzhi mthun pa bzhin no //
analyzed: chos gzhan dang gcig pa nyid ni chos gnyis kyi gzhi mthun pa yin te dper na autpala nyid sngon po'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir autpala dang sngon po gzhi mthun pa bzhin no //
translated: The sameness of nature with another property is a common locus of two properties, just as there is a common locus of a blue lotus and blueness, because of the recognition of a blue lotus as having the nature of blueness.

original: gzhi mtshungs pas de dag gzhi mthun pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhi mtshungs pas de dag gzhi mthun pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are not a common locus.

original: gal te rdzas gcig la rigs dang yon tan gnyis yod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur na ni de'i tshe chos nyid dang de ston par byed pa'i sgra gzhi mthun par 'gyur na de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te rdzas gcig la rigs dang yon tan gnyis yod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur na ni de'i tshe chos nyid dang de ston par byed pa'i sgra gzhi mthun par 'gyur na de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: If it were the case that a single substance had both a universal and a quality, then the universal and the word that expresses it would be a common locus, but that is not the case.

original: des na chos gnyis 'brel par rtogs pa nyid gzhi mthun pa dang / khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po yin no //
analyzed: des na chos gnyis 'brel par rtogs pa nyid gzhi mthun pa dang / khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po yin no //
translated: Therefore, the mere understanding of the connection between two things is a common locus, and the relation of qualifier and qualified is a relation between two things.

original: de ni ba lang nyid las yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ba lang nyid las yod pa ma yin te /
translated: It does not exist in the universal cowness,

original: chos gzhan dang rang bzhin gcig par 'gal ba nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa'i phyir dper na 'di'i ba lang nyid dkar po zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos gzhan dang rang bzhin gcig par 'gal ba nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa'i phyir dper na 'di'i ba lang nyid dkar po zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is contradictory for a different thing to be the same nature as another thing, as in the case of the thought, ‚ÄúIts cowness is white.‚Äù

original: gzhi mthun pa med pa nyid ston pa ni dkar po nyid kyi mtshan nyid de tsam gyi khyad par dang ba lang nyid de la brten par gyur pa'i blo gcig pa nyid du mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa med pa nyid ston pa ni dkar po nyid kyi mtshan nyid de tsam gyi khyad par dang ba lang nyid de la brten par gyur pa'i blo gcig pa nyid du mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The absence of a common locus is shown because the cognition of the mere characteristic of whiteness does not appear to be the same as the cognition that is based on cowness.

original: ba lang nyid dang dkar po gcig tu snang na blo gcig tu snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: ba lang nyid dang dkar po gcig tu snang na blo gcig tu snang bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If cowness and whiteness appeared as one, the cognition would appear as one.

original: des na gal te autpala dang sngon po bzhin du dkar po nyid ba lang nyid dang rang bzhin gcig par snang na /
analyzed: des na gal te autpala dang sngon po bzhin du dkar po nyid ba lang nyid dang rang bzhin gcig par snang na /
translated: Therefore, if whiteness appears as having the same nature as cowness, like a blue lotus,

original: de ltar na ba lang nyid la brten pa'i blo dkar po nyid mtshan nyid kyi khyad par dang gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na ba lang nyid la brten pa'i blo dkar po nyid mtshan nyid kyi khyad par dang gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then the cognition based on cowness would be the same as the characteristic of whiteness.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: 'di'i 'o zhes gzung ba'i phyir /üîΩdngos po las ba lang nyid dkar te snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di'i 'o zhes gzung ba'i phyir / dngos po las ba lang nyid dkar te snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is apprehended as ‚Äúthis,‚ÄùüîΩcowness appears as a thing.

original: dkar po zhes bya ba ni dkar ba'i mtshams su gyur pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dkar po zhes bya ba ni dkar ba'i mtshams su gyur pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Whiteness is understood as the limit of whiteness.

original: gal te ba lang nyid 'di'i yin la 'di ni dkar po yin no zhes dkar po'i ngo @196b bo nyid de'i dngos po nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ji ltar khyad par gzhan spang zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ba lang nyid 'di'i yin la 'di ni dkar po yin no zhes dkar po'i ngo @196b bo nyid de'i dngos po nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ji ltar khyad par gzhan spang zhe na /
translated: If one understands that this is the nature of a cow and that it is white, how can one eliminate another attribute?

original: lha rnams dga' bas bsam pa ma shes so //
analyzed: lha rnams dga' bas bsam pa ma shes so //
translated: The gods are delighted, but do not understand the intention.

original: dngos po la ni khyad par gzhan ma rtogs par mi brjod de /
analyzed: dngos po la ni khyad par gzhan ma rtogs par mi brjod de /
translated: One does not say that one does not understand another attribute of an entity.

original: tha na 'di zhes bya ba la 'di zhes bya bar bzung bas ba lang nyid las gzhan pa'i chos rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha na 'di zhes bya ba la 'di zhes bya bar bzung bas ba lang nyid las gzhan pa'i chos rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if one grasps this as this, one understands an attribute other than cowness because of the understanding of cowness.

original: 'on kyang gang la brda'i bye brag yod pa dkar nas rtogs pas de'i rang gi bdag nyid bcad nas rtogs pa'i phyir de la khyad par gzhan de 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang gang la brda'i bye brag yod pa dkar nas rtogs pas de'i rang gi bdag nyid bcad nas rtogs pa'i phyir de la khyad par gzhan de 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: However, since one understands that which is distinguished by a particular convention, one understands by eliminating its own nature. Therefore, another attribute is not related to that,

original: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: as was previously explained.

original: de lta na ni der yang 'brel pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta na ni der yang 'brel pa yod pa yin te /
translated: If that is so, then there is a relation there,

original: 'di'i ba lang nyid ni rtag pa'o zhes ba lang nyid rtag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'i ba lang nyid ni rtag pa'o zhes ba lang nyid rtag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because one understands that the cowness of this is permanent, understanding that cowness is permanent.

original: bsam pa'i khyad par yang mi shes pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsam pa'i khyad par yang mi shes pa nyid do //
translated: The difference in the thought is not understood.

original: 'di ltar 'di logs shig tu rang bzhin khyad par 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba dkar bar gyur pa'i ba lang nyid ni dngos po ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di logs shig tu rang bzhin khyad par 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba dkar bar gyur pa'i ba lang nyid ni dngos po ma yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the nature of a cow, which is white, does not become a thing that is separate from it.

original: 'on kyang 'di ni gang las dkar ba'i dngos po de'i rang bzhin kho na ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di ni gang las dkar ba'i dngos po de'i rang bzhin kho na ste /
translated: But it is just the nature of that thing which is white.

original: de lta mod kyi 'di'i ba lang nyid ces logs su dkar te /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi 'di'i ba lang nyid ces logs su dkar te /
translated: However, its cowness is white, separate from that.

original: rtogs pa tsam du zad do //
analyzed: rtogs pa tsam du zad do //
translated: It is just a conceptualization.

original: des na gang zhig ba lang nyid rten par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin de dag ni dkar mtshams kyi dngos po'i chos yin par rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na gang zhig ba lang nyid rten par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin de dag ni dkar mtshams kyi dngos po'i chos yin par rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, those natures that are understood to be the basis of cowness are to be understood as the qualities of the thing that is white.

original: 'di'i ba lang nyid rtag pa'o zhes de ltar ni nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i ba lang nyid rtag pa'o zhes de ltar ni nus pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not possible to say, ‚ÄúIts cowness is permanent.‚Äù

original: ba lang nyid rtag par rtogs pa na de'i mtshams rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba lang nyid rtag par rtogs pa na de'i mtshams rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For when cowness is understood to be permanent, its boundary is not understood.

original: 'di ltar de ni mi rtag pa yin la 'di'i ba lang nyid ni rtag pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur na de ltar ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni mi rtag pa yin la 'di'i ba lang nyid ni rtag pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur na de ltar ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, one would understand that this is impermanent and the cowness is permanent. But it is not so.

original: de nyid rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos dang ldan par rten de ltar rtogs par 'gyur na de lta na /
analyzed: de nyid rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'gal ba'i chos dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos dang ldan par rten de ltar rtogs par 'gyur na de lta na /
translated: If one understands that the very thing has the nature of a property that is contradictory with the characteristic of permanence and impermanence, then one would understand that the basis has the nature of a property that is contradictory with the characteristic of permanence and impermanence.

original: 'di ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: But it is not so.

original: de bas na de ltar rtogs pa'i ba lang nyid kyi rang bzhin don dam pa gang yin pa'i rang bzhin des ni 'di khyad par gzhan dang 'brel par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes nges par bya'o//
analyzed: de bas na de ltar rtogs pa'i ba lang nyid kyi rang bzhin don dam pa gang yin pa'i rang bzhin des ni 'di khyad par gzhan dang 'brel par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes nges par bya'o//
translated: Thus, one should understand that the ultimate nature of cowness, which is understood in this way, is not related to any other property.

original: des na 'dir re ba med pa ji ltar snang bzhin pa nyid yin par nges par bya'o //
analyzed: des na 'dir re ba med pa ji ltar snang bzhin pa nyid yin par nges par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand that the absence of expectation here is just as it appears.

original: ci ste don gyi rang bzhin yin pa de ltar ni ltos pa 'ga' yang med la /
analyzed: ci ste don gyi rang bzhin yin pa de ltar ni ltos pa 'ga' yang med la /
translated: If the nature of the object is like that, then there is no dependence on anything at all.

original: ji ltar ltos pa de ltar ni don gyi rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar ltos pa de ltar ni don gyi rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: It is not the nature of the object that is so in dependence.üîΩIn the second case, there is a common locus, or the relation of qualifier and qualified,

original: gnyis pa la ni gzhi mthun pa nyid dam khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i @197a * //
analyzed: gnyis pa la ni gzhi mthun pa nyid dam khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i @197a * //
translated: between the two terms, as indicated by the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the second line.üîΩTherefore, the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the second line is used because the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the first line refers to the second line.

original: dngos po yod de zhes snga ma dang 'brel to //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir zhes brjod pa'i snga ma la ni zhes brjod pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: dngos po yod de zhes snga ma dang 'brel to // de nyid kyi phyir zhes brjod pa'i snga ma la ni zhes brjod pa'i phyir na /
translated: The statement ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù refers to the first line.

original: gzhan gnyis pa la yang ni zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gnyis pa la yang ni zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù in the second line refers to the first line.

original: ba lang 'di mi rtag go zhe'am /
analyzed: ba lang 'di mi rtag go zhe'am /
translated: This cow is impermanent,

original: de bzhin du log pa dang skad cig ma yang yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du log pa dang skad cig ma yang yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: and in the same way, it is false and momentary.

original: de bzhin du autpala sngon po la sogs pa'i blo yang rtogs par bya'o //üîΩgzhi mthun pa de nyid ston par ni 'di ston pas na bstan pa ste ngag go //
analyzed: de bzhin du autpala sngon po la sogs pa'i blo yang rtogs par bya'o // gzhi mthun pa de nyid ston par ni 'di ston pas na bstan pa ste ngag go //
translated: The cognition of a blue lotus, etc., should be understood in the same way.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù indicates the common locus of the two terms.

original: des rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa yang gcig pa lta bur snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa yang gcig pa lta bur snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The statement ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù is a statement, i.e., a sentence, because it is a statement that indicates the common locus of the two terms.üîΩThe statement ‚Äúbecause of that‚Äù is a statement, i.e., a sentence, because it is a statement that indicates the common locus of the two terms.

original: rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa gang yin pa de bshad mod kyi de lta na yang gang zhig ston pas bstan pa de yin pas rtogs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa gang yin pa de bshad mod kyi de lta na yang gang zhig ston pas bstan pa de yin pas rtogs pa kho na'o //
translated: Although the one who possesses the division has been explained, still, since it is taught by the teacher, it is understood.

original: de lta na yang ba lang dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag la rnam par dbye ba dang ldan yang der gcig pa nyid du snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang ba lang dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag la rnam par dbye ba dang ldan yang der gcig pa nyid du snang ba yin no //
translated: Even so, in the statement ‚Äúwhite cow,‚Äù etc., although there is a division, there is the appearance of oneness.

original: gcig pa nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of oneness:

original: bsdus pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsdus pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe collection‚Äù is the name.

original: phan tshun 'brel par rnam par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: phan tshun 'brel par rnam par gnas pa ste /
translated: It is the mutual connection of the two.

original: ba lang dkar po'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir gnyi ga yang phan tshun 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba lang dkar po'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir gnyi ga yang phan tshun 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of the white cow is understood, both are mutually connected.

original: de dag ni rnam pa de lta bu yang yin la /
analyzed: de dag ni rnam pa de lta bu yang yin la /
translated: They are of that kind,

original: rnam par gcod pa'i chos mtha' dag kyang yin te /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i chos mtha' dag kyang yin te /
translated: and they are all the phenomena of exclusion.

original: gzhan sel ngo bo'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: gzhan sel ngo bo'i tshig gi don to //
translated: The meaning of the word is the nature of other-exclusion.

original: chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni tshig gi don 'di dag tha dad pa yin la /
analyzed: chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni tshig gi don 'di dag tha dad pa yin la /
translated: By the nature of phenomena, these meanings of the word are different.

original: 'brel pa rtogs pa'i phyir ni gcig dngos po yin pas na /
analyzed: 'brel pa rtogs pa'i phyir ni gcig dngos po yin pas na /
translated: For the sake of understanding the relation, one thing is the entity.

original: rnam par gcod pa'i chos mtha' dag bsdus pas rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa gcig pa lta bur ston par snang ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i chos mtha' dag bsdus pas rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa gcig pa lta bur ston par snang ba yin no //
translated: Since all the phenomena that are excluded are included, it appears as if there were a single thing that possesses differentiation.

original: ji ltar na 'di rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyang phan tshun 'du ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'di rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyang phan tshun 'du ba yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that differentiated phenomena also come together?

original: de lta bu'i brda'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: de lta bu'i brda'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir zhes smos so //
translated: Because they follow the convention in that way.

original: ngo bo 'dod pa ldan pa rtogs pa ni ngo bor rtogs pa ni rung bar nye bar gnas pa ngo bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni brda nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo 'dod pa ldan pa rtogs pa ni ngo bor rtogs pa ni rung bar nye bar gnas pa ngo bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni brda nyid do //
translated: The understanding of the entity that is desired to be possessed is the understanding of the entity that is suitable to be present. It should be understood as the understanding of the essence. This is the convention.

original: ji ltar tshig gi don rtogs pa brda las byung ba nyid yin pa de bzhin du tshig gi don gyi mthar thug pa'i ngag gi don rtogs par byed pa yang brda las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar tshig gi don rtogs pa brda las byung ba nyid yin pa de bzhin du tshig gi don gyi mthar thug pa'i ngag gi don rtogs par byed pa yang brda las byung ba yin no //
translated: Just as the understanding of the meaning of the words arises from the convention, in the same way, the understanding of the ultimate meaning of the words also arises from the convention.

original: des na ngag gi don kyang brda las byung ba kho na'o //
analyzed: des na ngag gi don kyang brda las byung ba kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the words also arises only from the convention.

original: 'di ni 'di ltar khyad par gzhan ma spangs pa las 'gyur ba yin no zhes @197b bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di ltar khyad par gzhan ma spangs pa las 'gyur ba yin no zhes @197b bshad pa ni /
translated: This is the case because it is not a different attribute that is abandoned.

original: rnam par gcod pa gzhan 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa gzhan 'dod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is because the other exclusion is asserted.

original: de ltar 'brel pa sgro btags pa'i dgos pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'brel pa sgro btags pa'i dgos pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purpose of superimposing a relation,

original: ldog pa dang ldog pa'i tshig gnyis kyis rang gi mtshan nyid dag la sgro btags pa gang yin pa der yang dgos pa de nyid nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ldog pa dang ldog pa'i tshig gnyis kyis rang gi mtshan nyid dag la sgro btags pa gang yin pa der yang dgos pa de nyid nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to include that very purpose in the superimposition of the two words exclusion and excluded in regard to their own characteristics,

original: kun la zhes smos te /
analyzed: kun la zhes smos te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúin all cases.‚Äù

original: skabs su bab pa'i don 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i don 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only in the present context,

original: 'on kyang gzhan du yang yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan du yang yin no //
translated: but also elsewhere.

original: rdzas brjod pa ni log pa'i sgra ste de yang byed pa po nyid du brjod par 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: rdzas brjod pa ni log pa'i sgra ste de yang byed pa po nyid du brjod par 'dod pa yin te /
translated: The expression ‚Äúsubstance‚Äù is a word for negation. That is also asserted to be expressed as the agent,

original: dngos po'i tshig dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i tshig dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is related to the word ‚Äúthing.‚Äù

original: 'gyur bas na dngos pos te bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'gyur bas na dngos pos te bya ba nyid do //
translated: Since it is changed, it is a thing, that is, an action.

original: de nyid ji skad bshad pa'i ldog pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ji skad bshad pa'i ldog pa nyid do //
translated: That is precisely the exclusion as it has been explained.

original: log pa dang / ldog pa'i tshig dag gi khyad par ni 'di nyid do //
analyzed: log pa dang / ldog pa'i tshig dag gi khyad par ni 'di nyid do //
translated: This is the difference between the words ‚Äúwrong‚Äù and ‚Äúreverse.‚Äù

original: dngos po'i bdag nyid bya ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed pa dag ni bya bar gyur pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid la khyad par ma 'brel pa zhes bya ba de ltar gyur pas ston par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po'i bdag nyid bya ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed pa dag ni bya bar gyur pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid la khyad par ma 'brel pa zhes bya ba de ltar gyur pas ston par byed do //
translated: Those who understand the nature of entities to be the nature of action, they teach that the nature of an entity that is action is ‚Äúwithout connection to a difference.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar lhas byin 'tshed do zhes bya ba gang gi tshe rten 'dzugs pa la sogs pa'i byed pa dang ldan pas de ltar ston pa de'i tshe 'gro ba la sogs pa brjod pa de dang de'i yul can dang mi 'dra ba'i de dang de'i yul can 'ga'
analyzed: 'di ltar lhas byin 'tshed do zhes bya ba gang gi tshe rten 'dzugs pa la sogs pa'i byed pa dang ldan pas de ltar ston pa de'i tshe 'gro ba la sogs pa brjod pa de dang de'i yul can dang mi 'dra ba'i de dang de'i yul can 'ga'
translated: In this way, when it is taught that Devadatta cooks, since he is endowed with the action of setting something on a stove and so on, at that time, the statement ‚Äúhe goes‚Äù and so on is not similar to the object of that statement.üîΩSome say that the object of that statement is not the object of that statement.

original: zhig rten 'dzugs pa la sogs par brjod pa des na 'di'i rang gi ngo bor gyur pa nyid de ltar brjod pa na /
analyzed: zhig rten 'dzugs pa la sogs par brjod pa des na 'di'i rang gi ngo bor gyur pa nyid de ltar brjod pa na /
translated: Since he is described as having the nature of that,

original: khyad par gzhan dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan dang 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: he is not connected to another difference.

original: gal te yang dal bus 'tshod do zhes 'di khyad par gzhan dang 'brel pa yod pa de lta na yang de nyid ji lta bar ni 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te yang dal bus 'tshod do zhes 'di khyad par gzhan dang 'brel pa yod pa de lta na yang de nyid ji lta bar ni 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: If it is said that ‚Äúit is cooking slowly,‚Äù even though this is a different attribute, it is not related to it in the way that it is to the action of cooking.

original: de bzhin du lhas byin gyi byed pa po nyid sgro 'dogs pa yang 'di lta bu'i don nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin du lhas byin gyi byed pa po nyid sgro 'dogs pa yang 'di lta bu'i don nyid de /
translated: The superimposition of Devadatta as the agent is also like this.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid kyis de'i bdag nyid la chos gzhan dang ma 'brel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid kyis de'i bdag nyid la chos gzhan dang ma 'brel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of his intrinsic reality, he is not related to other phenomena as their nature.

original: gang gi tshe lhas byin shing gis phru bar 'bras chan 'tshed do zhes 'tshed pa po byed pa po du ma'i ngo bor ston pa de'i tshe yang lhas byin la sogs pa rnams rgyu nyid dang / 'bras chan 'bras bu nyid de lta bu'i bya ba dang 'brel par khyad par gzhan la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i sgo nas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe lhas byin shing gis phru bar 'bras chan 'tshed do zhes 'tshed pa po byed pa po du ma'i ngo bor ston pa de'i tshe yang lhas byin la sogs pa rnams rgyu nyid dang / 'bras chan 'bras bu nyid de lta bu'i bya ba dang 'brel par khyad par gzhan la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i sgo nas bstan pa yin no //
translated: When it is said that ‚ÄúDevadatta, the cooker, cooks rice in a pot,‚Äù the cooker is shown to be a single agent. At that time, Devadatta and so on are shown to be causes and rice is shown to be the effect, in terms of their relation to the action, by turning away from other attributes.

original: 'dis lhas byin la sogs pa'i rang @198a * //
analyzed: 'dis lhas byin la sogs pa'i rang @198a * //
translated: This is because, if Devadatta and so on, who are distinct by nature, exist, then the nonobservation of the state of affairs that is the definition of rice is the observation of rice.

original: bzhin khyad par du gyur pa dag yod na 'bras chan gyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po ma dmigs pa las dmigs pa yin gyi 'bras chan gyi mthar thug pa de dag nye bar gnas pa na /
analyzed: bzhin khyad par du gyur pa dag yod na 'bras chan gyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po ma dmigs pa las dmigs pa yin gyi 'bras chan gyi mthar thug pa de dag nye bar gnas pa na /
translated: But when those who are the final rice are present,

original: 'tshed pa'i don 'ga' zhig snang ba ni med do //
analyzed: 'tshed pa'i don 'ga' zhig snang ba ni med do //
translated: there is no appearance of any object of cooking.

original: ngag gi sbyor pa 'di gnod par gyur pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ngag gi sbyor pa 'di gnod par gyur pa yang ma yin te /
translated: This application of the words is not faulty,

original: lan cig ma yin par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lan cig ma yin par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is applied not just once.

original: de'i phyir lhas byin la sogs pa nyid kyis de skyed par nges pa'i khyad par phul du byung ba dang / de ltar grub pa'i 'bras chan gyi rnam pa de ltar bya bar byas pa na /
analyzed: de'i phyir lhas byin la sogs pa nyid kyis de skyed par nges pa'i khyad par phul du byung ba dang / de ltar grub pa'i 'bras chan gyi rnam pa de ltar bya bar byas pa na /
translated: Therefore, it is certain that Devadatta and so on generate that, and the special excellence of that is that when the rice that is the effect of that is produced in that way,

original: de bzhin du de dang 'brel par rtogs pa yin no//
analyzed: de bzhin du de dang 'brel par rtogs pa yin no//
translated: it is understood to be related to that.

original: des na 'di dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid de ltar rtogs pa na khyad par gzhan dang 'brel pa med pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: des na 'di dag gi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid de ltar rtogs pa na khyad par gzhan dang 'brel pa med pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Thus, when the cause and effect of these are understood in this way, there is no relation to any other special feature.

original: 'di la don tha dad pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: 'di la don tha dad pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no difference in meaning.

original: yul gyi skad so sor dngos po 'jig pa'i sbyor ba la ni bya ba 'am byed pa po 'am gzhan yang rung cung zad ci ltar brtags pa bzhin snang ba ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: yul gyi skad so sor dngos po 'jig pa'i sbyor ba la ni bya ba 'am byed pa po 'am gzhan yang rung cung zad ci ltar brtags pa bzhin snang ba ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: In the application of the destruction of things in the various dialects, there is no appearance of any action, agent, or other, as imagined.

original: gzhan du shing rta la sogs pa dag las bum pa la sogs pa bye brag tu rtogs pa bzhin du sgra pa rnams kyis gtsug lag 'di bye brag tu rtogs par grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du shing rta la sogs pa dag las bum pa la sogs pa bye brag tu rtogs pa bzhin du sgra pa rnams kyis gtsug lag 'di bye brag tu rtogs par grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, just as a pot, etc. is distinguished from a chariot, etc., the grammarians would have established the distinction of this scripture.

original: yul nges pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin thams cad pa'i sgra'i rjes su 'gro bar rtogs pa na zur chag pa legs pa'i rtsa ba can du sems pas de ltar 'khrul pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: yul nges pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin thams cad pa'i sgra'i rjes su 'gro bar rtogs pa na zur chag pa legs pa'i rtsa ba can du sems pas de ltar 'khrul pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: When one understands the universality of the nature of these certainties of the object, thinking that the root of the good is broken, it is just a mistake.

original: bya ba brjod pa dang mtshungs par rtogs pa gang yin pa de la ni bya ba brjod pa 'khrul pa yin te gzhan du yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bya ba brjod pa dang mtshungs par rtogs pa gang yin pa de la ni bya ba brjod pa 'khrul pa yin te gzhan du yang de bzhin no //
translated: In that understanding which is similar to the expression of action, the expression of action is mistaken, as it is in other cases.

original: des na 'jig rten pa'i sgras ni ci tsam mngon sum gyis rtogs par de tsam kho na rtogs par byed pa la phra ba la sogs pa ni de ltar ma yin pas ji ltar 'di dag 'jig pa'i sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: des na 'jig rten pa'i sgras ni ci tsam mngon sum gyis rtogs par de tsam kho na rtogs par byed pa la phra ba la sogs pa ni de ltar ma yin pas ji ltar 'di dag 'jig pa'i sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúmundane‚Äù means that one understands only as much as is understood by direct perception. Subtlety and so on are not like that. How then could they be established by mundane direct perception?

original: mngon sum gyi gzhi tsam gyi tha snyad la yang 'gyur ba gang zhig yin pa /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi gzhi tsam gyi tha snyad la yang 'gyur ba gang zhig yin pa /
translated: What is the change in the convention of the mere basis of direct perception?

original: rdzas gcig la sogs pa ltar thog ma med pa'i bag chags la brten pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzas gcig la sogs pa ltar thog ma med pa'i bag chags la brten pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not based on beginningless predispositions, like the cognition of a single substance and so on.

original: 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: de ltar rtogs pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because such understanding is not established.

original: bum pa gcig ces bya bar ni rtogs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bum pa gcig ces bya bar ni rtogs pa kho na'o //
translated: It is only understood as ‚Äúone pot.‚Äù

original: 'di ni gtsug lag gi khyad par dag la rag las nas 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni gtsug lag gi khyad par dag la rag las nas 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: This is a mistake based on the peculiarities of the treatises,

original: 'gro ba sred med kyi bu las byung bar 'khrul @198b pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba sred med kyi bu las byung bar 'khrul @198b pa bzhin no //
translated: like the mistake that beings are born from NƒÅrƒÅya·πáa.

original: 'di nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: This is explained:

original: de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: ldog pa ni chos yin la ldog pa zhes bya ba ni chos can yin pa de bzhin du gzhan du yang chos dang chos can brjod pa'i brjod par bya ba'i don la khyad par 'ga' yang med de /
analyzed: ldog pa ni chos yin la ldog pa zhes bya ba ni chos can yin pa de bzhin du gzhan du yang chos dang chos can brjod pa'i brjod par bya ba'i don la khyad par 'ga' yang med de /
translated: Just as it is in that case, so it is in other cases as well. There is no difference at all in the meaning of the expressions that express the subject and the phenomenon.

original: de skad brjod pa na chos brjod pa'i brjod bya ni chos yin la /
analyzed: de skad brjod pa na chos brjod pa'i brjod bya ni chos yin la /
translated: When one says that, the phenomenon that is the object of expression of the expression of the phenomenon is the phenomenon.üîΩThe subject that is the object of expression of the expression of the subject is the subject.

original: chos can brjod pa'i yang chos can yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag gi brjod par bya ba la brjod par bya ba nyid med do zhes shes par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nges pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid du zhes khyad par du byas so //
analyzed: chos can brjod pa'i yang chos can yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag gi brjod par bya ba la brjod par bya ba nyid med do zhes shes par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nges pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid du zhes khyad par du byas so //
translated: In order to make it understood that the object of expression of those is not the object of expression, he specifies, ‚Äúthe object of a certain kind of cognition.‚Äù

original: ji ltar chos brjod pa'i brjod par bya ba'i don nges pa'i shes pas yul du byed pa de bzhin du chos can brjod pa yang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar chos brjod pa'i brjod par bya ba'i don nges pa'i shes pas yul du byed pa de bzhin du chos can brjod pa yang ngo //
translated: Just as the object of expression of the expression of the phenomenon is the object of a certain kind of cognition, so it is with the expression of the subject.

original: chos brjod pa'i don ni chos nyid du nges pas yul du byed la chos can brjod pa ni chos can nyid du yin par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: chos brjod pa'i don ni chos nyid du nges pas yul du byed la chos can brjod pa ni chos can nyid du yin par 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /
translated: The meaning of the term ‚Äúproperty‚Äù is ascertained as the property itself, and the meaning of the term ‚Äúpossessor of the property‚Äù is ascertained as the possessor of the property itself.

original: gcig gis ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: gcig gis ni zhes smos so //
translated: To respond to this qualm, the root text says, ‚ÄúThe first . . .‚Äù

original: chos brjod pa'i sgras brjod pa'i don gang yin pa de nyid chos can gyi sgras kyang yin no zhes tha dad pa med pa'i don nyid mdor /
analyzed: chos brjod pa'i sgras brjod pa'i don gang yin pa de nyid chos can gyi sgras kyang yin no zhes tha dad pa med pa'i don nyid mdor /
translated: The meaning expressed by the term ‚Äúproperty‚Äù is the same as the meaning expressed by the term ‚Äúpossessor of the property.‚Äù The point is that there is no difference between them.

original: de phyir de dag brjod bya las //
analyzed: de phyir de dag brjod bya las //
translated: This is stated in the following passage from the same text:

original: khyad par 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: khyad par 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference between them

original: zhes bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bstan to //
translated: in terms of what they express.

original: dngos po las tha dad pa med pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par nyid dngos po las bkar te de ltar bstan pas bya ba rtogs pas na ji ltar 'di rang nyid du zhugs pa na de'i gnas skabs rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par
analyzed: dngos po las tha dad pa med pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par nyid dngos po las bkar te de ltar bstan pas bya ba rtogs pas na ji ltar 'di rang nyid du zhugs pa na de'i gnas skabs rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par
translated: The difference in the state of the thing itself is not different from the thing itself. The passage teaches this by setting the difference in the state of the thing itself apart from the thing itself. Since the action is understood, how does the thing itself, when it is engaged in the action, come to have the difference in state that is associated with the action?

original: de bya ba'i khyad par du sgras bstan pa nas bsgrub par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de bya ba'i khyad par du sgras bstan pa nas bsgrub par brjod pa yin te /
translated: The difference in the state of the thing itself is taught by the term ‚Äúaction.‚Äù Therefore, the thing itself is said to be established by the action.

original: lhas byin gyi shing zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: lhas byin gyi shing zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the tree of Devadatta.

original: de bzhin du sgra las byung ba'i dngos po ma bskal par gyur pa gzhan dag kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra las byung ba'i dngos po ma bskal par gyur pa gzhan dag kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should understand other things that are not created from sound, but are imputed to it.

original: des ni ji ltar skabs su bab pa la ji snyed sgro btags pa de'i de nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: des ni ji ltar skabs su bab pa la ji snyed sgro btags pa de'i de nyid bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the reality of just that much superimposition as is appropriate in this context,

original: zhar la gzhan dag kyang bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: zhar la gzhan dag kyang bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: in order to teach other things incidentally, he says:

original: don de shes par byed 'dod pas //
analyzed: don de shes par byed 'dod pas //
translated: One who wishes to understand that meaning

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: should explain it.üîΩOne who wishes to understand that reality which has been explained should explain it.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i don de nyid shes par 'dod pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i de la phan pa'am byed pa dang ldan pa'am /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i don de nyid shes par 'dod pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i de la phan pa'am byed pa dang ldan pa'am /
translated: If one says, It is beneficial for that, or It is connected with that, or It is the cause of that,

original: gal te sgra'i gtsug lag la grags pa gzhan gyis brjod kyang rung /
analyzed: gal te sgra'i gtsug lag la grags pa gzhan gyis brjod kyang rung /
translated: even if one expresses it in another way that is known in the science of grammar,

original: de'i tshe yang de las khyad par gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang de las khyad par gzhan ni med do //
translated: at that time, there is no other distinction than that.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kho na bstan pa'i phyir de la phan pa la sogs @199a * //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kho na bstan pa'i phyir de la phan pa la sogs @199a * //
translated: In order to teach just the intrinsic identity, he says: It is beneficial for that, etc.

original: pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i don bstan pas ci bya dngos po dpyod pa ni de bstan par bya ba yin gyi rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag tu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i don bstan pas ci bya dngos po dpyod pa ni de bstan par bya ba yin gyi rjes su dpag pa'i yan lag tu ni ma yin no //
translated: What is the use of teaching the meaning of non-apprehension as a part of inference? The examination of entities is to be taught, but it is not a part of inference.

original: des na 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi mi 'byung ba ni 'brel pa'i tshad ma can kho na yin na 'brel pa nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi mi 'byung ba ni 'brel pa'i tshad ma can kho na yin na 'brel pa nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, non-occurrence with a reason of relation is only for one who has the valid cognition of relation. The relation is set forth.

original: 'di ltar du ba dang me yod pa dang med par rtogs par byed pa'i mngon sum tsam gyis ni med na ma 'byung ba nges pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'bras bu nyid kyis te /
analyzed: 'di ltar du ba dang me yod pa dang med par rtogs par byed pa'i mngon sum tsam gyis ni med na ma 'byung ba nges pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang 'bras bu nyid kyis te /
translated: Thus, mere perception that understands the existence and non-existence of smoke and fire does not ascertain non-occurrence without. However, it is by the effect.

original: thams cad du de ltar yin par mngon sum gyis mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / de med par skabs kyis sgrub par byed pa nyid kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du de ltar yin par mngon sum gyis mi rtogs pa'i phyir dang / de med par skabs kyis sgrub par byed pa nyid kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not understood by perception that it is so in all cases, and because the proof by the occasion of its non-existence also does not exist.

original: de bzhin shab zhes de ltar rtogs pa 'di ci yod zhes rnam par dpyod pa na gang gi tshe khyad par can gyi dbyibs rtogs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin shab zhes de ltar rtogs pa 'di ci yod zhes rnam par dpyod pa na gang gi tshe khyad par can gyi dbyibs rtogs pa de'i tshe /
translated: In that way, when this understanding is analyzed as to what exists, when the special shape is understood,

original: sha pa 'di ni shing gi rang bzhin nyid do zhes rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: sha pa 'di ni shing gi rang bzhin nyid do zhes rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of the tree is just the nature of the post.

original: ji ltar rtags rtogs pa bzung ba dag la chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni rnam par dpyad par nus pa kho na ste /
analyzed: ji ltar rtags rtogs pa bzung ba dag la chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni rnam par dpyad par nus pa kho na ste /
